MarkerCategory.name: stack
MarkerCategory.info: Hit F to make the mark disappear.

POI.info: Have someone select the path while the others move down to the Spider Queen area.
Take out the other spiders and the before killing the low level spiders, which summon the Spider Queen.
Lure the mob back here and kill them before running past the traps.
Green are generally safe areas. Disable the traps with the chain.
Interact with the chains to disable to traps.
Stack in the corner and pull the boss.
P1: Hodgins - Start
Info wait for the fire then run.
Arrows mark the burrow spawns.
With blinks and teleports you can get to the scepter faster after the graveling event finishes. Return to the center WP.
Grab and then WP to the center/Foefire's Heart
P1: Hodgins - Part 2
Avoid that side to prevent the ooze from spawning.
Collect the scepter pieces and turn them in here.
Arrows mark the general area for the pieces. Bring speed and stun breakers to deal with the knockdowns. Also kill the mob near the first piece to prevent Hodgins from running off.
P1: Hodgins - Part 3 - After turning in the pieces.
Bring stun breakers and run past the mobs.
P2: Detha - Start
Have people stack on the spot and cleave the mob once Detha triggers the event. Once it finishes WP back to the center/Foefire's Heart
Hit F to make the mark disappear.
P2: Detha - Part 2
Interact with the chain to open the gate.
If Detha hasn't followed pull back here or a bit further and she should spawn, then you can move back and it should trigger the defense trap event.

Defend Detha as she sets up the trap. Then talk to her to start the next event where you use the gun to lift the ectoplasmic oozes into the traps to charge it. Once the trap is charged, lure the boss on to it and kill it when its not longer a blue ghost.
P3: Tzark - Start
Kill each of the burrows as they spawn then after the last one go to the door.
P3: Tzark - Part 2
Have someone run ahead to trigger the event and kill the burrow to the right. After killing all the burrows and getting out of combat you can WP to the newly unlocked WP in the Rockfall Chamber.
P3: Tzark - Part 3
Path for Up or Forward
Apply stealth if you want to skip the mobs.
TA UP Path
Pull spiders and kill them before facing the boss. Boss has projectile attack which hits hard, spread out or stay at ranged to avoid a group wipe.
Stealth is advisable for these parts otherwise bring stun breakers for the mobs and range for the flowers.
If you aren't aggro'd you can wait here and apply more stealth.
Run into the spider egg sacs before the boss spawns to avoid more adds.
Stealth is advisable.
Up Path - Part 4
TA - Forward
Forward Path - Part 2
Optional: Blink skip at arrow.
Get super close to the crack and target the blink skill on the other side.
Watch the cog and wait for it to be in a bubble and then walk into the blue portals to get inside the bubbles. Do not collide with the bubble or you will down.
Forward Path - Part 3
Optional: Stealth past the mobs.
Optional: (Wait for CDs) and stealth past the mobs. If you down in the tunnel, you can rally off the flowers.
Forward Path - Part 4
P1: Fergg - Start

Jump to the right and wait for a group of enemies to pass, then jump back and break the gates. The very last set of gates near the end can be ran through. The patrols infinitely respawn and aren't worth killing.
Boss has knockbacks and stuns. Enemies also infinitely respawn from this area.
Avoid the mines (white lumps) and the golems which can one shot most players. Stealth prevents from mines from triggering.
Bring reflects, condi clear, and cleave the golems together. If the group can't handle them, try pulling one golem at a time and killing.
If the group is bad, you can have someone hold the cut scene by watching it. The rest of the group skips it and fights Troop Commander Kaeyi. This makes the Tazza fight easier.
P2: Rasolov - Start
If the door isn't open, interact with the chains to the left.
Attack the generals.
P2 - Part 2
Kite the boss under the smasher to break his shield. Afterwards, collect rocks for Rasolov and turn them in at the car.
P2 - Part 3
Careful dropping down.
When the boss spawns, you must kill the robots around the same time. There will be a buff that swaps around making one of the golems immune to cc and direct damage.
P3: Koptev - Start
You can drag the boss near the wall and cleave or you can fast DPS him down where he is.
Get out of combat and prepare to fall.
You can run straight ahead or divert left and circle around to reach the boss.
Optional: Long away around to get out of combat.
He will sometime cause a fire field around the player, you can remove it by walking to a water geyser.
He will sometime cause a fire field around the player, you can remove it by walking to a water geyser.
P3 - Part 2
Bring reflects and focus the car. When the door opens, run.
You can pull the mobs here and cleave them. (Interact to remove)
You can pull the mobs here and cleave them. (Interact to remove)
P1: The Butcher - Start
You can run past this event to the stairs.
Troll has knockdown and can hit hard, bring stun breakers and stability.
Wolves hit hard and have knockdown. Bring stability.
P1 - Part 2
Boss has a mechanic where he reflects projectiles and absorbs attacks. Attacks will remove the buff from him. Watch out for his ice field and the adds he summons.
P1 - Part 3
Avoid the red circles or be sent back to the start. Stay to the edges.
P1 - Part 4
Totems give the boss boons. Prioritize killing the protection totem. If your team is condi take out resolution totem instead. Pull the boss over and you can cleave them both.
P2: The Plunderer - Start
Most of the adds nearby stay out of the fight Boss has a few knockdowns/backs but doesn't hit too hard.
Can be ignored but might chase after, making the next boss fight harder. Stay out of his charge knockdown and his icy trail aoe.
Boss can fear you off the ship so fight him with your back against something stable. Bring Stability and Stun breakers.
You can pull the two quaggans and kill them separately. Boss has a high damage cone aoe and drops ice spikes aoe which also hit hard.
P2 - Part 2
Rest of the path is underwater. - If you have a lot of stealth you can sneak past and get into the boss room. Otherwise, it might be best to kill the enemies here.
Consider stealthing or killing the enemies.
You might be able to break aggro in the corner, before facing the boss. Boss has a high damage charge attack and will toss mines. Multiple hits from the mines can down a player.
P3: Zealot - Start
You can run past this event to the stairs.
Wolves hit hard and have knockdown. Bring stability.
Boss isn't much of a threat but totem might shoot knockdown bolts.
P3 - Part 2
Most attacks are melee; Occasionally howls and immobilizes players.
Recommend: Killing bolt launchers and adds.
Boss has launches and knockdowns, bring stability. Occasionally encases self in ice, attack to stop regeneration.
P3 - Part 3
Rest of the path is underwater. Consider: Stealthing past enemies.
Boss summons: Jellyfish which explode for high aoe damage and Barracuda moderate damage. If you choose to fight him on land on the stairs to the left, he hits a lot harder.
P1: Ferrah - Start
Focus the slave driver. The Effigy will respawn.
P1 - Part 2
Kill 10 acolytes. (Acolytes respawn every 40~ seconds) You can ignore everyone else.
P1 - Part 3

If you have a blink skill, you move past the locked gate before the event fire boulder room event starts to take out the gate controller and skip the mandatory 5 people for the braziers. After the controller is destroyed, come back to do the flame boulders.

If you are skipping, blink past this gate. To do the fire boulder room, you must take the flame and light 3 braziers at the end with in 15 seconds of each other. The flame in you hand will also expire if you take to long holding it. Portals will make this a lot easier. If not, hug the wall and time the boulders to get across.

If no one skipped the section, you must have 4 people continue to stand in the 4 braziers creating a dome. Only then, the 5th player can attack the door controller to progress the dungeon. Once the controller is destroyed, everyone can move off and continue to the boss fight.
Easy fight. The crystals heal the boss by can be ignored with high DPS
P2: Magg - Start
P2 - Part 2
Focus the nests and go up.
Use the chains.
Have someone wait at Magg while everyone else get to the hard to reach bombs.
P2 - Part 3
Grab a fire extinguisher from Magg. Use it to put out fires when you run across. Stealth helps.
Get everyone over here to so Magg will teleport over and look at the orange rock. The waypoint to Shrine of Sacrifice.
P2 - Part 4
Protect Magg from the spawning mobs and kill assassins.

You can ignore Gaheron Baelfire. Attack the Eternal Flame in the center of the room when the acolytes protecting it are dead. They respawn so time their deaths and then attack the Eternal Flame. Repeat until its dead.
P3: Rhiannon - Start

You must light 3 torches in a small time frame. If someone has stealth, it makes it easier for them to light the torch without getting interrupted. Otherwise, kill all but on enemy from the group and it shouldn't respawn.
P3 - Part 2
Defend event or if you are really good you can skip it but more than not you'll miss the jump.
P3 - Part 3
Avoid the bombs when they are on, or use stealth. Safe spots are marked with an arrow. You can kill the pet drake and open a new waypoint.

Wait for the cycle and be careful bc team members can trigger the bomb blast. Even if you are in a safe spot, if the bomb is armed the aoe will kill you there. If you see the aoe, dodge to avoid the damage.
Save spot from turrets.
P3 - Part 4 If you are still missing teammates you can kill the pet to get the waypoint up.
Boss can bat you straight into the lava stay away from the edges When he runs to the center, he's about to do the ring attack, dodge towards him as the earth rings popup. Consider bringing stability.
Bring stun breakers and condi cleanse, mobs have knockdowns and chills.
At least two players must make it across. Altogether 4 people must time the console deactivations with in a time window.
One person can do this console by standing in between and channeling them.
General Path - Part 2
Consider killing the boon granting turrets and bringing stun breakers and reflects.
P3: Front door - Start
Cannon Defense after the door opens, run left and wait for the abomination to walk past. Consider using stealth to avoid the mobs.
Wait out the abom, then run past up the stairs.
Crystal can freeze you for a long time. Otherwise, its like the prior encounter.
P3 - Part 2
Bring condi cleanse and run past the mobs.

3 people need to channel the cannons around the same time to break the shield on the boss. Sometimes an attack will interrupt you channeling the cannon. Once the shield is down, jump down and fight the boss. If you aren't fast enough, the shield will come back up knocking you into the lava.
P3 - Part 3
Same fight as before, but the essences will try and heal the boss.
P3: Forgotten - Start
Prioritize the Wraithlord Crusher as he can revive the Hunter.
P3: Forgotten - Part 2
Stealth Recommended
You want to stealth past the oneshot Spider. You do not want the Spider on the group when fighting the boss.
P3: Forgotten - Part 3
Current WP - Interact to Copy
Stealth and run past gorillas.
P3: Forgotten - Part 3
Stealth and run past.
Current WP - Interact to Copy
Ritual can be made easier with a kiter grabbing the mob aggro while someone with stealth caps the circles.
General: Path to Lupi
Stealth and run past
Fight the abominations in the corner.
You can push him back by standing in his red circle. Shove him into the wall and use a reflect on the wall while you fight him to cheese the mechanics.
